Cisco Prime Infrastructure

Published on 22 Mar 2024 by Suresh Babu

Photoshop HTML5 CSS3 Object Oriented JavaScript DOJO Java

Revolutionizing Network Management with Tailored UI Enhancements and Functionality Integration and Unlocking Network Efficiency, Spearheading Crucial UI Enhancements within Cisco Prime Infrastructure

Initiation and Landscape:

Embarking on the Cisco Prime Infrastructure project as Tech Lead UI from July 2014 to January 2016, I took charge of steering the frontend development efforts. Tasked with managing and configuring various network components such as VMs, Memory, Routers, Switches, Servers, and Client CPU Usage, Cisco Prime Infrastructure stood as a critical online networking management tool within Cisco's ecosystem.

Leveraging Object-Oriented JavaScript-driven widget-based templates, I optimized graphic design elements for enhanced web accessibility and user experience.

Technological Landscape:

Utilizing a blend of Adobe Photoshop for design mockups and HTML, CSS, Object-Oriented JavaScript, DOJO, and Java for development, Cisco Prime Infrastructure embodied a multifaceted approach to network management. Dynamic generation of charts, tree widgets, and dashboards based on REST API results ensured real-time insights and actionable data for network administrators.

Taking ownership of design specifications and resolving priority one (Pri1) issues within tight release windows, I ensured seamless coordination between development and QA teams.

Leadership and Coordination:

As part of a 50-member team, I orchestrated seamless coordination between development and QA teams, ensuring smooth execution of frontend tasks. Assuming complete responsibility for design specifications, I adeptly resolved priority one (Pri1) issues within tight release windows, ensuring minimal disruption to project timelines.

Through meticulous attention to code quality and consistency, I contributed to the successful development and deployment of a critical networking management tool for Cisco.

Technical Expertise and Implementation: The creation of website pages was meticulously executed using the DOJO Toolkit, leveraging Object-Oriented JavaScript-driven widget-based templates. Furthermore, I optimized graphic design elements for enhanced web accessibility and user experience, ensuring seamless navigation and interaction.

Ownership and Quality Assurance: Taking ownership of CSS, JavaScript libraries, and images, I upheld high standards of code quality and consistency throughout the project lifecycle. Contributing to the implementation of DOM structure in JSP, I ensured alignment with project requirements to achieve desired outputs efficiently.

"My tenure as Tech Lead UI for Cisco Prime Infrastructure was defined by technical proficiency, leadership, and meticulous attention to detail. By leveraging a diverse skill set and fostering collaboration across teams, I played a pivotal role in the successful development and deployment of a critical networking management tool for Cisco."
